snippet: Le Poisson Rouge’s close quarters emphasized a confessional intimacy in the monodramas at the heart of Musica Nuova’s performance of “The Arianna Project” on Monday night.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews concert of songs entitled The Arianna Project, performed by early-music troupe Musica Nuova at Le Poisson Rouge.
lead_paragraph: Le Poisson Rouge’s close quarters emphasized a confessional intimacy in the monodramas at the heart of Musica Nuova’s performance of “The Arianna Project” on Monday night.

headline.seo: Musica Nuova’s ‘Arianna Project’ at Le Poisson Rouge
headline.main: Fury of a Woman Scorned? Multiply That by Three
headline.print_headline: Fury of a Woman Scorned? Multiply That by Three
